abilities.name: Cellular Companions
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Zygarde's and Zygarde-GX's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Boost Fang
attacks.effect: Attach a Fighting Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
